title: Saishuu Heiki Kanojo (She, The Ultimate Weapon)
synopsis: Chise is an ordinary schoolgirl: small, frail, and not particularly intelligent. Her greatest joy is her budding romance with her classmate and childhood friend, Shuuji. They both live in a small military town in Hokkaido, where high schoolers have few concerns other than who is dating whom and complaining about the steep climb up "Hell Hill" every day before school.
related_anime: ['Saishuu Heiki Kanojo', 'Saishuu Heiki Kanojo: Another Love Song']
